name: Captive Collaboration
description:
Captive Collaboration is a puzzle-type platformer where your goal is to escape from the zoo with all the animals.

CONTROLS

Move horizontal - A & D or Arrow Keys

Jump - W or Space or Up Arrow

Switch animal - Q

A GAME MAKER'S TOOL KIT 2021 PROJECT

This game was made by three people within a 48-hour time period for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

CREDITS

Programing - Toby Hooper - https://reasonablegames.itch.io/

Art - Adrian Agren - https://androtex.itch.io/

Sound & Music - Outer Lives - https://outer-lives.itch.io/
